Betreff: [junit] How Junit will test all a=
ssert methods, even if one or
more assert methods fails in a TestCase?


Hi=
,
I am having one testcase say:

testInsert(){

      assertTrue();
      -=
 - - - -
      assertEqual();
      - - -
      assertXYZ()
}

In above cas=
e if first assert method i.e. (assertTrue())  fails, JUNIT
displays failure=
  which is occurred at
first assert only  & It dosent test or checks others=
 assert() Methods.
My question is:
How Junit will test all assert methods, =
even if one or more assert methods
fails in a TestCase?

Expecting your imm=
ediate reply with solution.

Thanks & Regards,
Dinesh Metkari
